history.proof: intros. unfold ex_lim_seq, Lim_seq. apply is_lim_seq_unique. apply is_lim_seq_abs. srun best use: Lim_seq_correct unfold: Lim_seq.

original: intros u H. unfold ex_lim_seq, Lim_seq. intros [l Hu]. apply is_lim_seq_unique. apply is_lim_seq_abs. apply ex_lim_seq_abs. exists l. apply Hu.
